00043 $ROOT= dirname(dirname(dirname(__FILE__)));
00044 
00046 $VIEW_PATH= $_SERVER['DOCUMENT_ROOT'].'/';
00047 
00048 $MODEL_PATH= $ROOT.'/Model/';
00049 
00050 require_once($ROOT.'/lib/defs.php');
00051 require_once($ROOT.'/lib/lib.php');

00059 $IMG_PATH= '/images/';
00060 
00062 $PF_PATH= $VIEW_PATH.'pf/';
00063 
00064 // For pfw
00065 $inst_dir= $PF_PATH;
00066 $dh= opendir("$inst_dir/include");
00067 while (FALSE !== ($filename= readdir($dh))) {
00068     if (!preg_match('/^\./', $filename) && !preg_match('/^CVS/', $filename) && !preg_match('/~$/', $filename)) {
00069         require_once("$inst_dir/include/$filename");
00070     }
00071 }
00072 closedir($dh);
